enchantment.magicamillion.cloaking.desc: Gives damaged players a moment of invisibility.
enchantment.magicamillion.light_flight.d: Prevents all fall damage when elytra are activated.
enchantment.magicamillion.volatile.desc: Gives each projectile fired a chance to explode upon impact.
enchantment.magicamillion.ends_curse.des: Randomly teleports the player when taking damage.
An old farmer cursed you, you cannot eat most foods.
enchantment.magicamillion.whirlpool.desc: Summons a whirlpool that launches entities into the air.
enchantment.magicamillion.shield_bash.de: Shields can be used as a weapon to deal damage.
enchantment.magicamillion.antidote.desc: Reduces the duration of harmful effects.
enchantment.magicamillion.wave_struck.de: Deals extra damage to nether mobs.
enchantment.magicamillion.waterlogged.de: Deals extra damage to nether mobs.
enchantment.magicamillion.iced.desc: Has a chance to inflict targets with an effect that slows and damages them.
enchantment.magicamillion.poison_guard.d: Has a chance to inflict poison to attackers.
Has a chance to inflict poison to attackers.
Slows entity when walking on soul sand.
enchantment.magicamillion.sculk_speed.de: Increases entity's speed when on sculk-related blocks.
enchantment.magicamillion.sifting.desc: Gives mined blocks a chance of dropping treasure based on the biome.
enchantment.magicamillion.swoop.desc: Entity deals extra damage when flying with elytra.
enchantment.magicamillion.disrobe.desc: Allows the attacker to steal the attacked entity's armor.
enchantment.magicamillion.bandit.desc: Allows the attacker to steal the attacked entity's weapon.
enchantment.magicamillion.undeath_protec: Protects against attacks from undead mobs.
enchantment.magicamillion.aqua_protectio: Protects drowning damage and guardian attacks.
enchantment.magicamillion.theft_guard.de: Lessens the chance that your equipment can be stolen when held or worn.
enchantment.magicamillion.flameproof.des: Allows the wearer to fly through lava streams. Useful when flying through the nether
enchantment.magicamillion.osprey.desc: Allows the user to locate entities and caves nearby.
enchantment.magicamillion.insurance.desc: A tool returns some of its materials when broken.
enchantment.magicamillion.leveled.desc: Deal more damage based on the health of the target.
